languages.text: После отбытия Вольного Торговца на Тассеру прибыл флот, оснащенный экстракторами глубинного действия, чтобы уничтожить весь проклятый минерал. Но с каждой истребленной мерой тассерция хирели и жители планеты: сначала гибли мелкие звери, затем несколько эпидемий потрясли мир, а вскоре люди потеряли возможность иметь потомство. Немногие спаслись с проклятого мира, но только лишь затем, чтобы зачахнуть под чужими звездами.
languages.translation_comment: Схизматик: уничтожение Тассерция или доверились Солу
Схизматик: уничтожение Тассерция или доверились Солу

languages.text: After the Rogue Trader's departure, a fleet arrived on Thassera equipped with hypogene material extractors, intending to destroy the cursed mineral in its entirety. But with every block of thassertium the fleet obliterated, the planet's denizens wasted away as well. Small animals were the first to die; then, the world reeled from a series of epidemics, and soon afterward, its people lost the ability to procreate. Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.
languages.original_text: После отбытия Вольного Торговца на Тассеру прибыл флот, оснащенный экстракторами глубинного действия, чтобы уничтожить весь проклятый минерал. Но с каждой истребленной мерой тассерция хирели и жители планеты: сначала гибли мелкие звери, затем несколько эпидемий потрясли мир, а вскоре люди потеряли возможность иметь потомство. Немногие спаслись с проклятого мира, но только лишь затем, чтобы зачахнуть под чужими звездами.

languages.text: Nach der Abreise {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} traf eine Flotte auf Thassera ein, die mit Extraktoren für hypogenes Material ausgestattet war und das verfluchte Mineral vollständig zerstören sollte. Doch mit jedem Block Thassertium, den die Flotte vernichtete, starben auch die Bewohner des Planeten. Zuerst traf es nur kleine Tiere, doch dann fegten mehrere Epidemien über die Welt, und kurz darauf konnten die Leute sich nicht mehr fortpflanzen. Einige konnten die untergehende Welt noch verlassen, nur um dann unter fremden Sternen ebenfalls zu vergehen.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's departure, a fleet arrived on Thassera equipped with hypogene material extractors, intending to destroy the cursed mineral in its entirety. But with every block of thassertium the fleet obliterated, the planet's denizens wasted away as well. Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.

languages.text: Après le départ {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, une flotte équipée d'extracteurs de matériaux hypogènes se posa sur Thassera, chargée d'anéantir toute trace du minerai maudit. Mais ce qu'ils n'avaient pas prévu, c'étaient les conséquences sur les habitants de la planète, qui dépérissaient un peu plus à chaque bloc détruit. Les petits animaux furent les premiers à mourir, puis le monde entier fut frappé par une série d'épidémies, et, peu après, la population perdit la capacité de procréer. Quelques-uns parvinrent à s'échapper de ce monde condamné, pour finir par mourir sous des cieux étrangers.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's departure, a fleet arrived on Thassera equipped with hypogene material extractors, intending to destroy the cursed mineral in its entirety. But with every block of thassertium the fleet obliterated, the planet's denizens wasted away as well. Small animals were the first to die; then, the world reeled from a series of epidemics, and soon afterward, its people lost the ability to procreate. Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.

Mais ce qu'ils n'avaient pas prévu, c'étaient les conséquences sur les habitants de la planète, qui dépérissaient un peu plus à chaque bloc détruit. Les petits animaux furent les premiers à mourir, puis le monde entier fut frappé par une série d'épidémies, et, peu après, la population perdit la capacité de procréer. Quelques-uns parvinrent à s'échapper de ce monde condamné, pour finir par mourir sous des cieux étrangers.

languages.text: 行商浪人离开之后，一支装备着深层矿物提取装置的舰队来到了塔瑟拉，打算彻底销毁这种遭到诅咒的矿物。然而，随着舰队不断销毁塔瑟拉水晶，行星上的居民也在不断死亡。体型较小的动物全部灭绝，各种各样的流行病在行星上肆虐。没过多久，所有塔瑟拉人都失去了生育能力。几乎没人能离开这个难逃一劫的世界，绝大部分人只能在陌生的群星之下慢慢枯萎。
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's departure, a fleet arrived on Thassera equipped with hypogene material extractors, intending to destroy the cursed mineral in its entirety. But with every block of thassertium the fleet obliterated, the planet's denizens wasted away as well. Small animals were the first to die; then, the world reeled from a series of epidemics, and soon afterward, its people lost the ability to procreate. Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.

languages.text: Tras la marcha de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, llegó una flota a Thassera con extractores de material hipogénico con propósito de destruir por completo el mineral maldito. No obstante, con cada bloque de thassertio que arrasaba la flota, los habitantes del planeta también desfallecían. Los animales pequeños fueron los primeros en morir. Después, el mundo sufrió una serie de epidemias, y, poco después, su gente perdió la capacidad de procrear. Pocos lograron escapar del mundo condenado, y solo para marchitarse bajo estrellas desconocidas.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's departure, a fleet arrived on Thassera equipped with hypogene material extractors, intending to destroy the cursed mineral in its entirety. But with every block of thassertium the fleet obliterated, the planet's denizens wasted away as well. Small animals were the first to die; then, the world reeled from a series of epidemics, and soon afterward, its people lost the ability to procreate. Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.

No obstante, con cada bloque de thassertio que arrasaba la flota, los habitantes del planeta también desfallecían. Los animales pequeños fueron los primeros en morir. Después, el mundo sufrió una serie de epidemias, y, poco después, su gente perdió la capacidad de procrear. Pocos lograron escapar del mundo condenado, y solo para marchitarse bajo estrellas desconocidas.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーが去った後、タッセーラには深成素材抽出装置を備えた艦隊が到着し、呪われた鉱物を完全に破壊するつもりだった。しかし、艦隊がタッセリウムの塊を破壊するたびに、惑星の住民たちも衰弱していった。最初に死んだのは小動物たちであり、その後、惑星は一連の疫病に見舞われ、間もなく人々は子孫を残す能力を失った。運命に見放されたその惑星から脱出した者はほとんどおらず、人々は数奇な運命のもとで衰えていった。
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's departure, a fleet arrived on Thassera equipped with hypogene material extractors, intending to destroy the cursed mineral in its entirety. But with every block of thassertium the fleet obliterated, the planet's denizens wasted away as well. Small animals were the first to die; then, the world reeled from a series of epidemics, and soon afterward, its people lost the ability to procreate. Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in ayrılışının ardından, lanetli minerali tamamıyla ortadan kaldırmak amacıyla hipojen madde çıkarıcılarıyla donatılmış bir filo Thassera'ya vardı. Ne var ki filonun yok ettiği her tasertiyum kütlesiyle birlikte gezegenin sakinleri de birer birer yok oldu. Önce küçük hayvanlar telef oldu. Sonra gezegen bir dizi salgınla sarsıldı ve çok geçmeden halk, üreme yetisini yitirdi. Pek az kişi bu lanetli dünyadan yakasını kurtarabildi. Onlar da garip yıldızların altında solup gittiler.

Few made it off the doomed world, only to wither away under strange stars.
